languages.text: Персонажи могут получать различные временные или постоянные эффекты, которые позитивно или негативно воздействуют на {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} и другие параметры. Такие эффекты можно условно разделить на три типа: -периодический урон -модификаторы характеристик и параметров -контроль {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}Негативные эффекты{/g} бывают общие и уникальные. Про их различия и разновидности вы можете узнать в {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}энциклопедии{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Персонажи могут получать различные временные или постоянные эффекты и состояния, которые позитивно или негативно воздействуют на характеристики и другие параметры. Такие эффекты можно условно разделить на три типа: - урон по времени - модификаторы характеристик и параметров - контроль Негативные эффекты бывают общие и уникальные. Про их различия и разновидности вы можете узнать в {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}энциклопедии{/g}.

languages.text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.
languages.original_text: Персонажи могут получать различные временные или постоянные эффекты и состояния, которые позитивно или негативно воздействуют на характеристики и другие параметры. Такие эффекты можно условно разделить на три типа: - урон по времени - модификаторы характеристик и параметров - контроль Негативные эффекты бывают общие и уникальные. Про их различия и разновидности вы можете узнать в {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}энциклопедии{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: - Damage-over-time effects - Characteristic and parameter modifiers - Control effects

Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: - Damage-over-time effects - Characteristic and parameter modifiers - Control effects

Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: - Damage-over-time effects - Characteristic and parameter modifiers - Control effects

Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: - Damage-over-time effects - Characteristic and parameter modifiers - Control effects

Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.

languages.text: Charaktere können verschiedene temporäre oder permanente Effekte erhalten, die den Zustand des Charakters entweder positiv oder negativ beeinflussen. Solche Effekte können grob in drei Gruppen unterteilt werden: -Verlaufsschaden-Effekte -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschafts{/g}- und Parameter-Modifikatoren -Kontrolleffekte Es gibt zwei große Kategorien {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativer Effekte{/g}: gewöhnliche und einzigartige. In den entsprechenden Einträgen der Enzyklopädie erfährst du mehr über die Unterschiede und erhältst konkrete Beispiele.
languages.original_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.

traits.locale_text: Charaktere können verschiedene temporäre oder permanente Effekte erhalten, die den Zustand des Charakters entweder positiv oder negativ beeinflussen. Solche Effekte können grob in drei Gruppen unterteilt werden: - Verlaufsschaden-Effekte - Eigenschafts- und Parameter-Modifikatoren - Kontrolleffekte

languages.text: Les personnages peuvent faire l'objet de divers effets temporaires ou permanents qui influent, de manière positive ou négative, sur leur état. Ces effets se répartissent en trois groupes : -Effets de dégâts progressifs -Modificateurs de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} et de paramètres -Effets de contrôle Il existe deux grandes catégories d'{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} : les effets communs et les effets uniques. Vous pouvez en apprendre davantage sur leurs différences et obtenir des exemples précis en consultant l'entrée correspondante dans l'encyclopédie.
languages.original_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.

traits.locale_text: Les personnages peuvent bénéficier de divers effets temporaires ou permanents qui influent, de manière positive ou négative, sur l'état du personnage affecté. Ces effets se répartissent dans trois groupes : - Effets de dégâts progressifs - Modificateurs de caractéristiques et de paramètres - Effets de contrôle

languages.text: 角色可能会受到各种暂时或永久性效果影响，不同的效果可能会对角色产生正面或负面影响。 所有影响大致可分为三类： - 持续伤害效果 - {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}与其他参数相关效果 - 控制效果 {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}分为两类：常规负面效果与独特负面效果。您可以在百科全书中查看相关条目，了解更多关于负面效果的详细内容。
languages.original_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.

traits.locale_text: 角色可能会受到各种暂时或永久性效果影响，不同的效果可能会对角色产生正面或负面影响。 所有影响大致可分为三类： - 持续伤害效果 - 属性与其他参数相关效果 - 控制效果

languages.text: キャラクターは自分の状態に良くも悪くも影響する、一時的または永続的な効果を受けることがある。 そのような効果は大まかに以下の3つのカテゴリーに分類される： - 継続ダメージ効果 -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}およびパラメーター調整因子 -コントロール効果 {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}は、通常タイプと特殊タイプ、大きくふたつのカテゴリーに分けられる。この違いと具体例について詳しくは、百科事典の関連する項目を参照すること。
languages.original_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターは一時的または永続的な効果を受けることがある。効果にはキャラクターのコンディションに良い影響を与えるものと、悪い影響を与えるものがある。 効果は大まかに以下の3つのカテゴリーに分類される： ー継続ダメージ効果 ー能力およびパラメーター調整因子 ーコントロール効果

languages.text: Los personajes pueden recibir distintos efectos temporales o permanentes que afectan, positiva o negativamente, la condición del personaje en cuestión. Esta clase de efectos se pueden dividir en tres categorías: -Efectos de daño continuado. -Modificadores de {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} y parámetros. -Efectos de control. Hay dos categorías generales de {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}: comunes y únicos. Puedes informarte sobre las diferencias y ver ejemplos concretos en la entrada correspondiente de la enciclopedia.
languages.original_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes pueden recibir distintos efectos temporales o permanentes que afectan, positiva o negativamente, la condición del personaje en cuestión. Esta clase de efectos se pueden dividir en tres categorías: - Efectos de daño continuado. - Modificadores de características y parámetros. - Efectos de control.

languages.text: Karakterler, durumlarını olumlu veya olumsuz yönde etkileyen geçici ya da kalıcı çeşitli etkilere maruz kalabilirler. Bu tür etkiler kabaca üç gruba ayrılabilir: -Zamanla hasar veren etkiler -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Nitelik{/g} ve parametre değiştiricileri -Kontrol etkileri {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}Olumsuz etkilerin{/g} iki ana kategorisi bulunur: Yaygın ve eşsiz. İlgili ansiklopedi kaydına başvurarak farklılıkları ve belirli örnekleri hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinebilirsin.
languages.original_text: Characters can receive various temporary or permanent effects that influence, either beneficially or adversely, the affected character's condition. Such effects can be loosely categorised into three groups: -Damage-over-time effects -{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Characteristic{/g} and parameter modifiers -Control effects There are two broad categories of {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: common and unique. You can learn more about their differences and specific examples by consulting the relevant encyclopedia entry.
